700759f-a.title: Bronx: City Island Avenue - Ditmars Street
700759f-a.text:
City Island Avenue (City Island), at the S. E. corner of
Ditmars Streot. Note the sign pointing to Casino Beach, on the island's
eaSt shore.
July 6, 1936
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS

700751f-a.title: Bronx: City Island Avenue - Ditmars Street
700751f-a.text:
402 City Island Avenue (City Tsland), east side, between
Ditmars and Bowne Streets, showing Horace E. Smith's garage.
Summer, 1923
P. L. Sperr
